newsitem.title: USA: International Thoroughbred sees Q3 loss.
newsitem.headline: International Thoroughbred sees Q3 loss.

text.p: International Thoroughbred Breeders Inc said Thursday it expected to report a net loss of about $1.6 million for the third quarter ended March 31.
In the third quarter a year ago, the company reported a net loss of $1.2 million.
The horse racing track and hotel operator said the loss would be the result of increased costs from casino development projects.
It said it would also be due to a write off in the second quarter of its fiscal year of deposits associated with an option to buy a parcel of land in Las Vegas.
Throroughbred said it expected to file its Form 10-Q on May 20.
